roleset.name: speech: enunciation, wording
roleset.note: DICTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. Relation to 'dictate.01'. (from diction.01-n)

example.name: arg1
example.text: This reminder and threat are embodied in the diction and tone of the statement from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia .
example.arg: of the statement from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia
